channel.title: consul on YZLC
channel.description: Recent content in consul on YZLC

item.title: consul
item.description: 单节点 1 2 mkdir -p /usr/local/consul-data/logs nohup consul agent -server -data-dir=/usr/local/consul-data/ -node=agent-one -bind=0.0.0.0 -bootstrap-expect=1 -client=0.0.0.0 -ui > /usr/local/consul-data/logs/consul.log 2>&1 &
